thread.title: Ex-Iceland Leader Now Hosting Movie Nights as Ambassador to the U.S.

author: Georgi Kantchev
title: Ex-Iceland Leader Now Hosting Movie Nights as Ambassador to the U.S.
text:
A decade after the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal has checked in on dozens of the bankers, government officials, chief executives, hedge-fund managers and others who left a mark on that period to find out what they are doing now. Today, we spotlight former Fed Chairman Ben Bernanke and ex Iceland Prime Minister Geir Haarde. 

Geir Haarde was prime minister of Iceland when the tiny Northern European country experienced a financial meltdown in 2008. Major banks failed and the currency collapsed. He was indicted by...
